mapper.select: select t1.evaluation_user as evaluationUser,t1.evaluation_sender as evaluationSender ,t1.order_id as orderId,t1.sender_id as senderId,t1.user_id as userId,t1.status,t1.create_time as createTime, t2.user_name as senderUserName, t3.user_name as cUserName, t4.order_num as orderNum,t4.order_msg as orderMsg FROM evaluation t1 INNER JOIN user t2 ON t1.sender_id = t2.id INNER JOIN user t3 ON t1.user_id = t3.id INNER JOIN `order` t4 ON t1.order_id=t4.id WHERE t1.sender_id=#{senderId} and t1.status=0
